name: Full Circle (itch) (Isabella Djurovic)
description: In desperate need of a job to pay your student loans, you have submitted your application to every corner of the city. Just when you'd given up hope, you finally received a response - an invitation from the city's most infamous mystic in some seedy part of town. Reading the page, you see they want you to be their intern and eventually succeed them as the premium mystic. An odd offer, but you don't really have any choice. You decide to drop by and see what it's like.
